description:
The date & time that an event, subEvent, or (periodic) place starts as an ISO-8601 date. For example `2021-05-17T22:00:00+00:00`.

- Event: The very first date & time that the event starts
- SubEvent: The start date & time of this specific occurence of the event
- Place: The start date & time of the period that the `periodic` place exists (see `calendarType`)

Always required on subEvents.

Required on events and places when using one of the following calendarTypes:

- single
- multiple
- periodic
title: startDate
